trans-unit.source: The legend table style is automatically determined by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 圖例資料表樣式是由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> 控制項自動決定。

trans-unit.source: Legend items will be fit vertically within the legend.
trans-unit.target: 圖例項目將會垂直放入圖例中。

trans-unit.source: This style is preferred when <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking.Left" /> or <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking.Right" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking" /> 設定為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking.Left" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking.Right" /> 時，這是慣用樣式。

trans-unit.source: Legend items will be fit horizontally within the legend.
trans-unit.target: 圖例項目將會水平放入圖例中。

trans-unit.source: This style is preferred when <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking.Top" /> or <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking.Bottom" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking" /> 設定為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking.Top" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking.Bottom" /> 時，這是慣用樣式。
